verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: the upright go posture trainer] [ARG2: worth it] mom always told you to sit up straight but there no one to remind you now say hello to the upright go it a gadget that about the size of a car key fob that attaches to your back and reminds you to sit up straight the upright go is paired to a free app downloaded on your device after downloading the app you can track or train your progress when you ’re in tracking mode the upright go lets you know how long you slouch and how often you sit up straight when it in training mode the gadget vibrates like a cell phone after 8 seconds of slouching the makers of upright go say the device works in about 2 weeks you can find it at www uprightpose com or amazon we got it for 79 95 we gave the upright go to a youtuber from richmond named caroline burciaga check out her video below if you would like to watch our other product testing stories visit www youtube com tiffanycraig while you ’re there subscribe to the channel if you have a product for tiffany to try email her telltiffany khou com tiffany telltiffany khou com richmond amazon caroline burciaga tegna inc tegna
